Heymarket is a business texting platform: Heymarket is a business texting platform that gives you the power to engage with people using shared inboxes.
Enter your Heymarket API Key. You can fi: Enter your Heymarket API Key. You can find it in your Heymarket account settings.
Create a new contact or update an existi: Create a new contact or update an existing contact by phone number
Send a custom text message to an individ: Send a custom text message to an individual contact or a list
Send a message using a template to an in: Send a message using a template to an individual contact or a list
Update an existing list in your team by: Update an existing list in your team by adding or removing members, or updating list properties
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Phone number in E.164 format without the: Phone number in E.164 format without the plus sign (e.g. 14155553434)
Whether the contact is opted out of mess: Whether the contact is opted out of messaging
Contact ID for updating an existing cont: Contact ID for updating an existing contact. If not provided, will attempt to create a new contact
When true, replaces all existing custom: When true, replaces all existing custom fields. When false, merges with existing ones. Note: contact name is always overwritten
Unique identifier for the inbox from whi: Unique identifier for the inbox from which the message will be sent
Unique identifier for the sender (member: Unique identifier for the sender (member ID from Get Inboxes)
Phone number in E.164 format without the: Phone number in E.164 format without the plus sign (e.g. 14155553434). Required if not sending to a list or chat
Array of phone numbers in E.164 format w: Array of phone numbers in E.164 format without the plus sign for group MMS messages
Unique identifier for the Heymarket temp: Unique identifier for the Heymarket template to send
Phone number in E.164 format without the: Phone number in E.164 format without the plus sign (e.g. 14155553434). Required if not sending to a list
Optional message text body to override o: Optional message text body to override or supplement the template
Unique identifier for the list to update: Unique identifier for the list to update
Phone number in E.164 format without the: Phone number in E.164 format without the plus sign to add to the list (e.g. 14155553434)
Phone number in E.164 format without the plus sign to remove from the list (e.g. 14155553434)
Object of list targets. Keys are phone n: Object of list targets. Keys are phone numbers, values are objects with optional first name (f) and last name (l)
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc.
HEAD: HEAD
Trigger when a new conversation is start: Trigger when a new conversation is started or an existing conversation is updated
Trigger when a new contact is created or: Trigger when a new contact is created or an existing contact is updated
The Heymarket user ID for verification. This is the ID of a team member who has access to the inboxes.
